rung.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: one of the bars that form the steps of a ladder
rung.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a particular level or position in an organization or system
rung.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Humans are on the highest rung of the evolutionary ladder.
rung.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a particular level or position in an organization or system
rung.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: She is already on the highest rung of the salary scale.
